title: Re: Michael Crichton is a badass
Re: Michael Crichton is a badass
content:
Michael Crichton scathingly fictionalized one of his critics as a minor character in his new book, as a CHILD RAPIST, and not only that, but it's a character with no purpose. Crichton is just taking a snipe at one of his critics. He's a jackass and a pompous man-child for doing that, but the way he's so blunt about it is hilarious.

So basically, the comment about having a small penis made me giggle.[center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: Michael Crichton is a badass
content:
I don't believe there's any way to prove Crichton has meant this particular critic. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] This critic may just seek attention by making such wild claims.

But most of all, I don't really care. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
